translations: （由公证人）对……进行公证（notarize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Notarizing this certification at the China Embassy /Consulate in local;
sentences.translation: 将此证书在当地的中国大使馆/领事馆公证。

sentences.sentence: "Notarizing nephropathy"represents dilemma of proving in adverse drug reaction.
sentences.translation: 前言： “肾衰公证”体现了药品不良反应案件的证明困境。

sentences.sentence: Party B may amend commodity information. Party B presents Party A the amendment application only after notarizing and recording all contents of amendment at the Notary Office.
sentences.translation: 乙方可以修改商品信息，但应将修改的内容传真至公证处备案后方可向甲方提交修改申请。
